name: When two power collide
description:
Crazy doctor tries to gather super power by feeding kids. The house in wood has many kids that wander around eating turkey. They are producing energy gradually. However, evil spirit is also around and tries to interfere just for fun. As experiment assistant, your job is try to free those kids who are struggling with spirit.

Those kids who are struggled with ghost will stop wandering, eating, set them free by using f key to burn spirit. Movement follows usual awsd control.

The project is not complete for game jam.
